|===
|Default Column 1 |Literal Column 2

|This column's content is default
|This column's content is treated as literal. That _ * or `` are literal chars and aren't formatting characters in this cell.

|This column's content is default
|This column's content is treated as literal. That _ * or `` are literal chars and aren't formatting characters in this cell.
